children.value: The CLI is divided into five panes:
: Prints the output of the user's commands
: Displays the status/information of the following items
A Hummingbot feature that allows users to simulate trading strategies without risking any assets. Learn more about
Hummingbot has 9 strategy configurations that can be used for trading or liquidity mining. Hummingbot strategy guide can be found
You have the option to save a strategy configuration after every bot creation, allowing you to reuse a strategy quickly with
: Displays the information of the following items
Number of trades done by the bot
Exit from the current configuration question
